languages.text: "Скорее! Нужно вернуться в поселение! Пусть даже псайкерское колдовство ведет нас — мы или поможем тем, кто нас ждет, или избавим этот мир от очередного наваждения скверны!"

traits.locale_text: "Скорее! Нужно вернуться в поселение! Пусть даже псайкерское колдовство ведет нас — мы или поможем тем, кто нас ждет, или избавим этот мир от очередного наваждения скверны!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Quickly! We must return to the settlement! It may be a psyker's sorcery that leads us, but in the end, we will either help those who await us or purge this world of more corrupted delusions!"
languages.original_text: "Скорее! Нужно вернуться в поселение! Пусть даже псайкерское колдовство ведет нас — мы или поможем тем, кто нас ждет, или избавим этот мир от очередного наваждения скверны!"

traits.locale_text: "Hurry! We have to get back to the settlement! Even with the psyker sorcery leading us — we will either help those who awaits us or purge the world from more of the filthy delusions!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Hurry! We have to get back to the settlement! Even with the psyker sorcery leading us — we will either help those who awaits us or purge the world from more of the filthy delusions!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Hurry! We have to get back to the settlement! Even with the psyker sorcery leading us — we will either help those who await us or purge the world from more of the filthy delusions!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Hurry! We have to get back to the settlement! Even with the psyker sorcery leading us — we will either help those who await us or purge the world from more of the filthy delusions!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Quickly! We must return to the settlement! It may be a psyker's sorcery that leads us, but in the end, we will either help those who await us or purge this world of more corrupted delusions!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Quickly! We must return to the settlement! It may be a psyker's sorcery that leads us, but in the end, we will either help those who await us or purge this world of more corrupted delusions!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Deprisa! ¡Hemos de volver al asentamiento! ¡Aunque nos guíe la brujería de un psíquico, ayudaremos a quienes nos esperan o purgaremos este mundo de más delirios corrompidos!».
languages.original_text: "Quickly! We must return to the settlement! It may be a psyker's sorcery that leads us, but in the end, we will either help those who await us or purge this world of more corrupted delusions!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Deprisa! ¡Hemos de volver al asentamiento! ¡Aun guiados por la brujería del psíquico, ayudaremos a quienes nos esperan o purgaremos este mundo de sus blasfemos desvaríos!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “快点！我们必须赶紧回到村子里！或许指引我们的人确实是灵能者，但无论如何，我们都必须帮助那些等待我们援手的人，或者把那些腐化的幻觉从这个世界中驱逐出去！”
languages.original_text: "Quickly! We must return to the settlement! It may be a psyker's sorcery that leads us, but in the end, we will either help those who await us or purge this world of more corrupted delusions!"

traits.locale_text: “快点！我们必须在灵能者的引导下，赶紧回到那座村庄！我们必须帮助那些等待我们援手的人，或者把那些邪恶的幻觉从这个世界中驱逐出去！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Vite, il faut retourner au village ! Même si nous sommes guidés par la sorcellerie d'un psyker, nous aiderons ceux qui nous attendent ou nous purgerons le monde de ces abominables illusions ! »
languages.original_text: "Quickly! We must return to the settlement! It may be a psyker's sorcery that leads us, but in the end, we will either help those who await us or purge this world of more corrupted delusions!"

traits.locale_text: « Vite, il faut retourner au village ! Même si nous sommes guidés par la sorcellerie d'un psyker, nous aiderons ceux qui nous attendent ou nous purgerons le monde de ces abominables illusions ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「急げ！集落に戻らねばならない！異能者の魔術に導かれようとも…待ち受ける者たちを助けるか、世界を、これ以上の不浄なる妄執より浄化するかのどちらかだ！」
languages.original_text: "Quickly! We must return to the settlement! It may be a psyker's sorcery that leads us, but in the end, we will either help those who await us or purge this world of more corrupted delusions!"

traits.locale_text: 「急げ！集落に戻らねばならない！異能者の魔術に導かれようとも…待ち受ける者たちを助けるか、世界を、これ以上の不浄なる妄執より浄化するかのどちらかだ！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Schnell! Wir müssen zurück zur Siedlung! Mag ja sein, dass uns die Magie eines Psionikers führt, aber am Ende werden wir denen helfen, die uns erwarten, oder diese Welt von noch mehr verderbten Wahnvorstellungen befreien!"
languages.original_text: "Quickly! We must return to the settlement! It may be a psyker's sorcery that leads us, but in the end, we will either help those who await us or purge this world of more corrupted delusions!"

traits.locale_text: "Beeilung! Wir müssen zurück zur Siedlung! Selbst, wenn die psionische Hexerei uns führt — wir helfen entweder denen, die uns erwarten, oder befreien die Welt von weiteren widerwärtigen Wahnvorstellungen!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Çabuk! Yerleşim yerine geri dönmeliyiz! Bize yol gösteren bir ruhsezerin sahirliği olsa da en nihayetinde ya bizi bekleyenlere yardım ederiz ya da bu dünyayı daha da yozlaşmış sanrılardan arındırırız!"
languages.original_text: "Quickly! We must return to the settlement! It may be a psyker's sorcery that leads us, but in the end, we will either help those who await us or purge this world of more corrupted delusions!"
